1a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa mya 'das dang po bzhugs s+ho//
2a1(mdo sde): @##// bam po dang po// sangs rgas dang byang
2a2(mdo sde): rku sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o//
2b1(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das
2b2(mdo sde): mchog sa / skyes du stongs pa 'byung ba gas
2b3(mdo sde): ha ri la pa ti'i 'grag shing sa la drang gnyis kyi bar ni/ dge slong gi dge
3a1(mdo sde): @#/ 'du chen po// brgya stong phrag brgya du snyed kyis yangs
3a2(mdo sde): su bskor cing / mdun du bad te/ thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ bcom
3a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das dpyid zla 'bring po'i ches bco lnga'i nyin par/ yongs su mya ngan
3b1(mdo sde): las 'das par gshegs su nye ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs chen pos/ srid pa'i rtse me'i
3b2(mdo sde): bar khyab par sems can thams cad la so so'i skad gsung 'di skad ces grag par gyur to// de bzhin gsheg
3b3(mdo sde): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ skye bo mang po rnams la thugs brtse ba/ sems can
3b4(mdo sde): gyi skyabs dang mgon du gyur pa sems can thams cad la sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa/ sems
4a1(mdo sde): can gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang / rten dang gnas su gyur pa/ de yongs sum
4a2(mdo sde): ngan las 'da'o// so so'i skye bo dag/ the tshom dang som nyir gyur pa yod na zhu zhing dri ba'i dus nang gi tha ma
4a3(mdo sde): 'di shu zhing gsol cig ces pa'i gsung gis yongs su grags par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
4a4(mdo sde): snga dro'i dus kyi tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od rnam pa sna tshogs bkye ba ni 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang /
4b1(mdo sde): dmangar po dang / dkar po dang / shel lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang phyogs
4b2(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du yongs su snang bar byas na gnas pa'i lam rgyu drug gi sems can
4b3(mdo sde): dag 'od zer des reg ma thag tu khan ma tho ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar gyur to// de'i tshe so so
4b4(mdo sde): skye bo dag de lta bu'i ltas mthong zhing zos nas/ mya ngan chen pos yid gdungs te/ dus gcig tu tshong de rdung
4b5(mdo sde): zhing dus nas 'di skad du/ e ma'o shin tu byams pa'i pha mar gyur pa/ kyi hud kyi hud mya ngan las 'das
5a1(mdo sde): sam zhes smras nas/ thal mo mgo dang brang la rdebs te tshong de rdung ngo // kha cig ni
5a2(mdo sde): lus kyang rab tu 'dar zhing ba spu kun langs nas/ skad kyis brnangs pa tsam du ngus so// de'i tshe na sa chen po dang
5a3(mdo sde): ri dang rgya mtsho yang rab tu g.yos zhing 'khrugs so// de nas sems can de dag gcig gcig sgo srid mya ngan pas
5a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ 'di skad du kye grogs po dag mya ma byed par myur dus mchog gi grong khyer du/ skyes du stobs pa
5a5(mdo sde): che 'byung ba'i gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bder 'ding ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo
5b1(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar/ 'jig rten na skal ba
5b2(mdo sde): gcig gam/ bskal pa gcig 'gribs kyi bar du bzhugs par gsol du 'deng ngo // zhes smras so//
5b3(mdo sde): la la ni gcig lag pa la gcig 'jus nas/ 'di skad du 'jig rten stongs te/ sems can
5b4(mdo sde): bsod nams zas pas/ mi dge ba'i las 'jig rten na 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/ grogs po
5b5(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs nges kyis/
5b6(mdo sde): bdag cag myur du 'dong ngo zhes smras so// la la ni 'di skad du 'jig rten stongs so
6a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten stongs so bdag cag la deng sran
6a2(mdo sde): chad ni mgon dang skyabs med de/ dngul 'phongs par gyur to// deng kho nar bla na med par
6a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang yongs su bral bas/ da slan chad som nyi dang the tshom za ba su la zhu zhes
6a4(mdo sde): smra'o// // de'i tshe na tshad med pa'i nye gnas chen po che dang ldan pa ka ta ya na
6a5(mdo sde): chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa bkul dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa dge slong
6a6(mdo sde): chen po de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg pas/ lus kun 'dar zhing mi bzod pa tsam
6b1(mdo sde): du rab tu g.yos so// sems kyang myos nas tshong nges 'debs shing / de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis non
6b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to// de'i tshe gzhan yang dge slong brgya stong phrag brgyad cu snyed thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur
6b3(mdo sde): pa/ bya ba byas pa/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dbang po thams cad rab tu dul ba klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar mthu tsho ga
6b4(mdo sde): stong pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ phyis bdag gi don rab tu rnyed pa/ tsan dan gyi tsha la ltar can dan gyis yongs su bskor ba/
6b5(mdo sde): seng ge'i rgyal po ltar seng ges yongs su bskor ba/ de lta bu'i tshad med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyang sangs
6b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa sha stag go// de dag kyang snga dro nyi ma shar ma thag tu gnas nas byung ste/ so shi ba 'cha' ba
6b7(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg nas gcig 'di skad du grogs po dag myur du kha la ga khrus shig ces smras so//
6b8(mdo sde): gcig la
7a1(mdo sde): bya// de skad ces smras ma thag tu lus kyi ba spu kun langs nas lus
7a2(mdo sde): la khyab par khrag rgyas pa ni me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur to// mig mchi mas gang nas sdug ba sngal chen po myong bar gyur
7a3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir theg pa chen po don dam
7a4(mdo sde): ba'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs
7a5(mdo sde): ba dag bstan pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos ston pa rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir sems can thams
7a6(mdo sde): cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der myur du dong nas/ spyi bos sas rgyas kyi zhabs
7a7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas bal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe
7b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang ku da la'i bu mo dge slong ma dpal bzang dang / dge slong ma snyen dga' ma dang / dge slong ma
7b2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i blo gros la sogs te/ dge slong ma khri phrag drug cu snyed thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa
7b3(mdo sde): zag pa zad pasems la dbang du gyur pa/ bya ba byas pa/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs
7b4(mdo sde): ba/ dbang po rab tu dul ba/ klu chen po ltar gzi brjid rab tu che ba/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab dang ldan pa sha stag
7b5(mdo sde): ste/ de dag kyang snga dro'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma thog ma shar nas/ lus kyi ba spu kun gyi bung zhes byed
7b6(mdo sde): nas/ lus la khyab bar khrag gis rgyas pa ni/ me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur
7b7(mdo sde): mig mchi mas yongs su gang nas/ sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur to// de dag kyang
8a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
8a2(mdo sde): rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thabs su dgongs te/ gsungs pa dag bstan pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun mi gcad
8a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sems can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der myur du dong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag
8a4(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mas bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // dge slong ma de dag gi nang na/ dge slong ma kha cig ni byang chub
8a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ste/ mi'i nang na klu lta bu sa bcu rab tu non pas mi g.yo ba la gnas pa sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/ bud med kyi lus ston kyang rtag tu tshad med pa
8a6(mdo sde): bzhi la nan tan byed pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi skur yang sprul pa sha stag go// de'i tshe klung gang ga gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems
8a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nang na klu lta bur sa bcu rab tu non pa mi g.yo ba la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyi ston pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
8a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgya mtsho dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis thog mar
8b1(mdo sde): drangs nas/ thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la bkur bsti byed pa/ theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mkhas pa/ theg pa chen po la/
8b2(mdo sde): shin tu mos pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu srung ba/ 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyi sems dang sbyor ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ma grol ba grol bar yid dam
8b3(mdo sde): 'cha' ba/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/ spyod pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ ma grol ba grol bar byed pa/
8b4(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshe ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba/ rgyan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa/ de
8b5(mdo sde): lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa sems can thams cad la bu gcig dang 'dra bar lta ba sha stag go// de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma shar ma thag tu sangs
8b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg nas/ lus kyi ba spu kun langs te/ lus la khyab pas khrag gis rgyas pa ni/ ji ltar me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur te/ mig mchi
8b7(mdo sde): mes yongs su gang nas sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to// de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong
8b8(mdo sde): ba nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas babs su dgongs te gsungs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun
9a1(mdo sde): mi 'chang ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der rab tu/
9a2(mdo sde): dong nas/ phyin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du bskor te/ thal mo sbyar nas sti bstang dang bcas pas phyogs
9a3(mdo sde): cig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang gi'i gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi dge bsnyen pa/ khrims lnga yongs su srung ba 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen gzi
9a4(mdo sde): brjid dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po dang / dge bsnyen legs pa'i yon tan la sogs pas thog mar drang ste thams cad kyang gnyen por 'gyur ba'i chos
9a5(mdo sde): la shin tu mos pa ni 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / bde ba dang / rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa dang / bdag dang
9a6(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang / nges pa dang me nges pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / skyabs su mi 'gro ba dang / sems can dang sems can ma yin pa dang /
9a7(mdo sde): ther zug pa dang ther zug pa ma yin pa dang / bde ba dang bde ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / chang pa dang chad pa ma yin
9a8(mdo sde): ba dang / bya ngan las 'das pa dang / mya pha las 'das pa ma yin pa dang / lhag ma dang lhag ma yin pa la sogs te/ gnyen por gyur pa'i chos
9b1(mdo sde): 'di dag la rtog par mos pa sha stag go// gzhan yang bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la thos par mos pa/ ji ltar thos pa bzhin du gzhan la ston nus pa/
9b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs su srung ba/ theg pa chen po la snyoms pas gdungs pa ltar mos pa/ bdag kyang shin tu mos la/ skom pas gdungs/ gzhan
9b3(mdo sde): yang ngoms par byed pa/ bla na med pa'i ye shes la shin tu 'jug pa/ theg pa chen po la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu srung ba/ 'jig rten pa
9b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems dang / shin tu sbyor ba/ ma rgal ba sgrol ba/ ma grol ba grol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshe ba/ ma
9b5(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor ba/ rgyan chen pos rnam par brgyan pa/ sems shin tu zab mo'o ro la mos pa/ tshul khrims yongs su
9b6(mdo sde): dag pa thams cad kyang / de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed cing / bu gcig dang 'dra bar gnyis
9b7(mdo sde): su med par snyoms pa sha stag go// de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma shar ma thag tu 'od zer gyis reg nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur zhugs la bzhen pa'i
9b8(mdo sde): byed/ thams cad kyis so so nas spos kyi shing khri phrag du ma bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ spos kyi shing can dan dang a ka ru dang / gaur shi sha man ngan
10a1(mdo sde): dang / lha'i shing srung can la sogs pa'o// shing de dag kyang mdzes pa'i ri mo dang ldan zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis
10a2(mdo sde): sbas pa/ 'od shin tu 'tsher shing gsal ba ni dper na ri mo mkhan gyi ri mo mtshan sna tshogs bkye ba dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ kha
10a3(mdo sde): dog sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar por ldan te/ 'gro ba mang pos mthong nas dga' bar 'gyur ba sha stag go/ shing rnam pa mang po de dag la
10a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos kyi lde gu dang / gur bum dang / a ka ru dang / spog la sogs pas yongs su bskus la/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
10a5(mdo sde): gtor cing brgyan pa ni 'di lha ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / me tog ku mu ta dang / me tog pad mo dang / me tog pun da ri ka la sogs pa'o// shing de dag
10a6(mdo sde): la gzhan yang tshon rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i ba dan shin tu 'jam zhing mdzes pa yongs su dbyangs pa ni/ dper na lha'i na bza' ke'u sha ya 'am/ shu ma lta bu'o//
10a7(mdo sde): spos kyi shing de dag kyang rin po che'i shing rtas skyes te/ rin po che'i shing rta de dag las kyang / 'od rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser
10a8(mdo sde): bo dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba dang / shing rta'i gca' shing la bar rngang la sogs pa'ang / rin po che sdesna bdun gyiso rnam par sbas te/ shing rta de dag re/
10b1(mdo sde): re'ang rta bzhi bzhis drangs so// rta de dag kyang mgyogs kyang rlung dang 'dra'o// shing rta re re'i mdun na rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan lnga bcu snyed dang te/
10b2(mdo sde): gser gyi dra bas bla re bris so// rin po che'i shing rta re re'i steng yang / rin po che'i gdugs lnga bcu snyed bres so// shing rta re re la yang me tog gis phreng ba
10b3(mdo sde): dbyangs pa ni 'di lta ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / me tog ku mu ta dang / me tog pad mo dang / pun da ri ka rnams te/ 'dab ma gser/ ge sar ni rdo rje
10b4(mdo sde): la byas te/ me tog gi ge sar de dag gi nang na yang bung ba nag po lding zhing rtse'o// gzhan yang sgra skad shin tu snyan pa dang / de ma yin pa mi rtag pa dang /
10b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag med pa'i sgra yang 'byin to// de dag las gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon spang ba spyod pa'i sgra dang /
10b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra grags pa ni 'di lta ste/ glu dang gar dang gling bu dang / dgu po rgyud mangs dang / se'u dang shi ra dang / rnga'i skra
10b7(mdo sde): rnams so// rol mo'i sgra de la gzhan yang 'di skad du/ kyi hud kyi hung 'jig rten stongs so zhes zer ba'i sgra yang byung ngo // shing rta re re'i mdun na/
10b8(mdo sde): dge bsnyen rin po che sna bana'i khri'u thogs pa re re yad de/ khri'u de'i steng na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog spungs pa ni 'di lta ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / ku
11a1(mdo sde): mu ta pang mo dang / pun ta ri ka dang / gur gum dang / byug spos dang / bdug spos la sogs pa/ mchog tu gyur
11a2(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams bshams so// dge bsnyen rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la bsod snyoms rnam pa sna tshogs bshams pa yang thams cad
11a3(mdo sde): tsan dan dang a ka ru'i shing bsrungs can bsregs te/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu las g.yos su byas so// zhal zas de dag kyang ro rnam pa drug dang ldan no//
11a4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / dngar ba dang tsha ba dang / lan tshwa bro ba dang / bska ba'i ro dang / gzhan yang yon tan rnam pa gsum dang ldan te/ mnyen
11a5(mdo sde): zhing 'jam pa dang / gtsang ba dang chos bzhin byas pa dang / de lta bu la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas/ stobs po che 'byung ba'i
11a6(mdo sde): gnas/ sA la'i shing drung du gnas so// gzhan yang gser gyi bye mas sa gzhir brdal te/ lha'i na bza' ka tsa lin da dang / kham pa la dang / dar gyis
11a7(mdo sde): de'i steng du 'ating ba ni/ khor khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis tshun chad yogs par byas so// sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun
11a8(mdo sde): gyis seng ge'i khri bshams te/ khri de dag kyang 'bang du mtho khyang ri rab lhun po dang mnyam mo// khri de dag gi steng na rin po che'i gur phub nas do shal rnam pa mang po dbyangs
11b1(mdo sde): so// sA la'i shing de dag la yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ba dan dbyangs ste/ gdugs bres nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos bsung can gyi lde gus shing de dag la bskus
11b2(mdo sde): so// shing gi bar yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chal par bkang ngo // dge bsnyen de rnams so so nas yid la 'di snyam du sems so// so so'i skye bo dag
11b3(mdo sde): gal te bza' bas brel na bza' ba sprin no// btung bas brel ba la btung ba/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la mgo/ mig 'dod pa rnams la mig/ de ltar so so'i'o
11b4(mdo sde): skye bo dag ci 'dod pa bzhin du thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/ sbyin pa de yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang rnyog pa'i sems med do// de las
11b5(mdo sde): gzhan pa'i 'jig rten gyi longs spyod kyi phyir bsam pa'i sem mod kyi/ bla na med pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub 'ba' zhig gi phyir ro// dge bsnyen de dag bla na med
11b6(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub la bde bar gnas nas/ yang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mchod pa 'di bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las
11b7(mdo sde): 'da'o snyam bsam nas de dag gi lus kyi ba spu kun langs nas/ lus khrag gis rgyas pa ni me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur/ mchi mas ni mig gang sdug bsngal
11b8(mdo sde): chen pos ni gdungs par gyur te/ seM sa nis mchong pa'i yo byad ba shams pas/ rdzas kyi shing dang / rgyal metshan dang / bdan dang gdugs dang / zhal
12a1(mdo sde): @#zas kyi rnam pade po che'i shing rtas skyes nas/ sangs rgyas gang na bar song ste phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhabs
12a2(mdo sde): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas skad phyung ste dus so// du
12a3(mdo sde): ba'i sgras gnam sa yang g.yos so// brang brdung zhing tshong nges 'debs te/ mchi mchar bzhin du zags nas gcig 'di skad du/ kyi hud kyi hung grogs po
12a4(mdo sde): dag 'jig rten stongs so// 'jig rten stongs so zhes smras nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lus brdabs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
12a5(mdo sde): to// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi mchod pa bshams pa/ nangs kyi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
12a6(mdo sde): dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung ste ma bzhes nas/ de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang ngo // dge bsnyen de dag bsam pa bzhin du
12a7(mdo sde): ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdung ste cang mi smra bar 'khod pa ni/ dper na pha ma shin tu byams pa'i bu gcig pa/ blo bur du nad kyis btab ste tshe 'phos nas dur
12a8(mdo sde): du bskyal te/ shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs pa dang 'dra bar/ dge bsnyen de dag mya ngan gyis yid gdungs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams
12b1(mdo sde): dge snyen ma dpal bye 'phreng
12b2(mdo sde): gnas gcig tu bzhag ste/ phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang ga gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi dge bsnyen ma khrims lnga yongs su srung ba/
12b3(mdo sde): spyod lam dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen mtsho ba'i yon tan dang / dge bsnyen ma byi sha ka la sogs pas thog mar drangs nas/ dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri bzhi stong
12b4(mdo sde): snyid thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa sems can chad med pa brgya stong 'dul ba'i phyir/ bud med kyi lus su ston cing / khyim gyi chos yongs su smod pa/
12b5(mdo sde): bdag gi lus la sbal gdug pa bzhi dang 'dra bar rtogs pa/ lus la rtag tu srin bu grangs med pas za ba dang / lus 'di la shin tu gtsog pa dang / 'dod pas yongs
12b6(mdo sde): su bcings par rtogs pa/ lus 'di la khyi ro dang 'dra bar 'jigs su rung ba dang / lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ bu ga kun nas rtag tu zag par rtogs pa/ lus
12b7(mdo sde): 'di ni mkhar dang 'dra ste/ sha dang lpags pa dang / rtsa dang rgyas pas rnam par bkris pa/ lag pa dang rkang pa ni 'khar gyi nyen lta bur gyur pa/ mig ni skar khung
12b8(mdo sde): ltar gyur pa/ mgo ni khang pa ltar gyur te/ sems rgyal po dang 'dra bar de'i nang na gnas par rtogs pa/ lus mkhar dang 'dra ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
12b9(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su spangs te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ni de la chags par byed do// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi srin bu
13a1(mdo sde): gnas par rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ 'dam bu'i myu gu 'am/ e ran da'am/ chu'i chu bur ram/
13a2(mdo sde): chu shing lta bur rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/ skad cig skad cig tu 'pho zhing / dper na glog gi 'od dam/ gzar be'i chu 'am/ sgyu ma'am/ chu
13a3(mdo sde): la ri mo bris pa lta bur rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni 'gyur zhing 'pho ba ste/ dper na chu 'gram ga yang sa'i sdong po lta bur rtogs pa/ lus 'di ring por mi thogs pa
13a4(mdo sde): ste/ sbrang khyi dang 'phar ba dang / srin bya dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / khra dang / skya ka dang / khyi ltogs pa'i gzan du gyur te/ 'di la mkhas pa shes
13a5(mdo sde): rab can su zhig mos shing chags par byed snyam du rtogs pa/ mig gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po'i chu blugs kyang gzod nus kyi/ lus 'di mi rtag pa dang / mi gtsang
13a6(mdo sde): ba dang / gcog pa ni brjod sla ba ma yin par rtogs so// sa chen po 'di rgya shug tsam du dril tam/ chung ngu na yung kar gyi 'bru'am/ rdul phra mor gsil ba
13a7(mdo sde): ni sku'i lus 'di'i nyes pa'i skyon brjod pa ni sla ba ma yin par rtogs pa/ de bas na mchil ma 'dra bar yongs su spangs nas/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis dge
13a8(mdo sde): bsnyen pa rnams/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos la rtag tu nan tan byed pa/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde nyan cing 'dzin pa la mos
13b1(mdo sde): ba/ thos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher ston nus pa/ sngon gyi smon lam yongs su 'dzin pa/ bud med kyi lus la shin tu smod pa/ shin tu skyon che bar shes pa/ snying
13b2(mdo sde): po med par rtogs pa/ sems rtag tu rnal 'byor du spyod pa/ de bzhin du yang dag par rtogs cing / mtha' med par 'khor ba'i rgyun yongs su gcod pa/ theg pa
13b3(mdo sde): chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar mos pa/ bdag shin tu ngoms pas gzhan yang ngoms par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la rab tu mos pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu srung
13b4(mdo sde): ga bud med kyi lus su ston kyang yang dag par byang chub sems dpa' sha stag ste/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi bsam pa dang / shin tu sbyor ba/ ma rgal ba sgrol ba/
13b5(mdo sde): ma grol ba grol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi chad pa 'tshe ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba/ rgyan chen pos yongs su brgyan
13b6(mdo sde): pa/ tshul khrims yongs su srung ba/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems bskyed cing / bu gcig dang 'dra
13b7(mdo sde): bar gnyis su med par mnyam pa sha stag go/ de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma thog mar shar ba na/ 'od kyis reg na sa gcig la gcig 'di skad du deng ni shing sa
13b8(mdo sde): la drung gnyis kyi drung du deng ngo zhes smras so// dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa/ snga ma bas phyed kyi bzang bar sbyar te/ sangs rgyas
14a1(mdo sde): gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas/
14a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun du bcas pa la/ mchod pa'i yo byad bshams
14a3(mdo sde): pa 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bzhes cig ces gsol to// de la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang
14a4(mdo sde): ngo // dge bsnyen ma rnams bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur pas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang ga'i bye ma
14a5(mdo sde): snyed kyi li tsa byi'i bu/ grong khyer yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang 'khor rnams dang / gzhan yang
14a6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal rigs su gtogs pa rgyal po'i 'khor dang bcas te/ thams cad kyang chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims yongs su srung ba/ spyod lam dang
14a7(mdo sde): ldan pa/ slob pa gzhan la zhugs shing / dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa bzhin du tshar gcod pa sha stag/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du dam 'cha'o// bdag
14a8(mdo sde): cag gser dang dngul dang rin po che'i gter mdzod lta bur/ yang dag pa'i chos shin tu zab mo bdud rtsi lta bu zad mi shes pa yun du 'jig rten na gnas par byas te/
14b1(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang de dag la rtag tu nan tan du sbed par 'dong bar gyur cig/ gal te zhal nas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos la/ dbang za zhing bskur ba zhig yod na/ bdag
14b2(mdo sde): cag gis de'i lce bcad do// zhes dam bcas zhing gzhan yang khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu 'byung ba dag/ tshul khrims las nyams par gyur na/ bdag cag
14b3(mdo sde): gis khyim par phab ste/ las byed do zhes byas te/ gal te dam pa'i chos la nan tan du byed na/ bdag cag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar/ rim gro dang bkur bsti bya'o/
14b4(mdo sde): zhes pa dang / gal te dge 'dun las dam pa'i chos la nan tan du spyod pa zhig yod na/ bdag cag gi rjes su yid rang zhing de la mthu yang sbyin par bya'o zhes dam
14b5(mdo sde): bcas pa/ rtag tu theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thos par mos shing / thos nas kyang gzhan la rgyas par ston pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ li
14b6(mdo sde): tsa byi'i bu rnam dag dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / li tsa byi'i bu bag yod rnam par dag pa dang / li tsa byi'i bu rtag tu dri med rnam dag yon tan la sogs te/ de dag
14b7(mdo sde): gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye grogs po dag myur bar de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der song ste/ mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod
14b8(mdo sde): du 'ding ngo // de nas li tsai byi'i bu de dag re re nas kyang / ba glang brgyad khri ba zhi stong snyed pa shams te/ ba glang de re re'i mdun na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang /
15a1(mdo sde): gdugs kyang bsham mo// gdugs nangs kyi chung ngu yang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig khebs so// ba dan nangs
15a2(mdo sde): kyi thung ngu yang ring khyang dpag tshad sum cu so gnyis so// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nangs kyi chung ba yang mtho khyad dpag tshad brgya pa ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yong byang
15a3(mdo sde): bshams nas sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags te phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas bcom ldan 'das
15a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa yo byad 'di dag 'bul na/ de gzhin
15a5(mdo sde): gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to// de la de bzhin gshegs pacang mi gsung nas bzhes su
15a6(mdo sde): ma gnang ngo // li tsa byi'i bu rnams bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ shin tu mya ngan gyi non nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sa las shing ta
15a7(mdo sde): la bdun srid du 'phags/ steng gi nam mkha' la cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang ga lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi blon po chen po dang / khyim bdag dang
15a8(mdo sde): tshong dpon theg pa chen po la shin tu mos pas/ slob pa gzhan la zhugs pa gang zhig/ yang dag pa'i chos la smon pa zhig yod na/ de dag gis mthus thul ba ni/
15b1(mdo sde): ji ltar rtsa ba dang shing la ser ba bab pa lta bu sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshong dpon nyi ma'i 'od dang / tshong dpon 'jig rten skyong dang / tshong dpon chos skyong la sogs pa
15b2(mdo sde): thogs mar grangs te/ de dag gis so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni/ snga ma bas lnga 'gyur tsam bshams te/ shing sa la drung gnyis kyi bar gang
15b3(mdo sde): na ba der song ngo // phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
15b4(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la/ mchod pa'i yid byang 'di dag 'bul na bzhes shig ces gsol to// de la de
15b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo // tshong dpon de dag bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ shin tu mya ngan gyi yid gdungs par gyur te/
15b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sa las shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang
15b7(mdo sde): yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal po btsun mo dang sras su bcas pa gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par/ rgyal phran de ma yin pa thams
15b8(mdo sde): cad dang / grong khyer dang ljongs dang / grong 'dab thams cad kyi mi thams cad dang bcas pa la 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba zla 'od dri med rgyal ba la sogs pa thog
16a1(mdo sde): mar drangs nas/ so so nas dmag rnam bzhi dang bcas te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags so// rgyal po de
16a2(mdo sde): dag re re yang / 'khor khri phrag brgya cu dang bcas so// dmag gi tshogs kyang ba glang dang / rta pa ste/ ba glang de dag kyang che ba drug dang ldan pa/ rta rnams kyang mgyogs
16a3(mdo sde): kyang rlung bzhin te/ mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa yang snga ma bas drug 'gyur gyis lhag go// rin po che'i gdugs nangs kyi chung ba yang / chu zheng kho ra khor yug tu dpag
16a4(mdo sde): tshang brgyad khebs so// ba dan nangs kyi chung ngu yang ring khyad dpag tshad bcu drug snyed do// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nangs kyi chung ngu yang / mtho khyad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa
16a5(mdo sde): drug go// rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / yang dag pa'i chos la gnas pas/ log pa'i chos kun la shin tu smod pa theg pa chen po la bkur bsti byed pa/ theg pa chen
16a6(mdo sde): po la shin tu mos pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig bzhin dang 'dra bar byams pa/ zhal zas bshams pa'i dri yang dpag tshad bzhi'i bar du bro ba bshams nas
16a7(mdo sde): snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs te/ shing sA la drung gnyis kyis bar de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs pa der song nas phyin pa dang /
16a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis/ sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams mchod pa 'di dag 'bul na/
16b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag cag gi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen pas bzhes su
16b2(mdo sde): ma gnang ngo // rgyal po de dag kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur pas/ shin tu mya ngan gyi yid gdungs par gyur te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang
16b3(mdo sde): klung gang ga bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams tshogs te/ de la gcig ma gtogs pa ni ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo 'ba' zhig/ sems 'dul ba'i phyir
16b4(mdo sde): bud med kyi lus su ston te/ rtag tu lus kyis nan tan du sprod cing stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos la sems 'dris shing goms par
16b5(mdo sde): byed pa de la sogs te btsun mo khams gsum bzang mo dang / btsun mo 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pas thog mar drangs so// thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos
16b6(mdo sde): la gnas shing tshul khrims yongs su srung ba/ spyod lam dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig dang 'dra bar byams pa sha stag go// de dag kyang gcig
16b7(mdo sde): la gcig 'di skad du/ bdag cag kyang myur bar sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs par dong ngo // zhes smras so// rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyi mchod pa'i ye byad bshams
16b8(mdo sde): ba ni/ snga ma pas bdun 'gyur gyis lhag ste/ me tog dang spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / dar gyis ba dan dang / gdugs dang / zhal zas mchog
17a1(mdo sde): rnams so// rin po che'i gdugs nangs kyi chung ngu yang / chu zheng khor khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu drug khebs so//
17a2(mdo sde): ba dan nangs kyi thung ngu'i chad kyang dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug go// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan yang nangs kyi dma' ba'i tshad kyang dpag tshad drug cu rtsa brgyad snyed do// zhal zas
17a3(mdo sde): kyi dri gsung gis kyang dpag tshad brgyad kyi bar du bro ba/ mchod pa'i yo byad de lta bu dag bshams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bar song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan
17a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du ma bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi sangs
17a5(mdo sde): rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la/ mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te 'bul ba 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i
17a6(mdo sde): slad du/ mchod pa nangs kyi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo //
17a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams bsams pa bzhin ma gyur nas/ shin tu mya ngan gyi yid gdungs te/ sku 'bal zhing brang la thal mos rdebs te/ tshong de rdung
17a8(mdo sde): ba ni ji lta bu'i nang na/ sdug pa shi ba dang 'dra bar gyur nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de'i tshe klung gang ga brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi lha'i bu mo rnams la
17b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu mo yangs pa'i mig ces bya bas thog mar drangs nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye grogs po dag mthong ngam ltos shig 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
17b2(mdo sde): mang pos mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul ba mthong ngam/ bdag cag cag kyang mchod
17b3(mdo sde): pa'i yo byad bshams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pa'i 'og tu mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// /
17b4(mdo sde): kye grogs mo dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pa'ang shin tu dka'o/ mchod pa nangs kyi tha ma bshams te dbul ba'ang shin tu dka'o//
17b5(mdo sde): gal te bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das na/ 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// lha'i bu mo de rnams kyang theg pa chen po la 'dod pa/ theg
17b6(mdo sde): pa chen po la mos pa/ thos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher ston nus pa/ theg pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar gyur cing / bdag shin tu ngoms par byed
17b7(mdo sde): ba/ skems pas gdungs pa gzhan dag kyang ngoms par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la slob pa/ slob pa gzhan la zhugs pa dag/ theg pa chen po la sun 'byin
17b8(mdo sde): cing phrag dog byed pa yod na/ ji ltar rtsa la ser ba bab pa bzhin du bul ba/ tshul khrims yongs su srung ba/ spyod lam dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten thams
18a1(mdo sde): cad kyi yid dang / sbyor ba la shin tu mkhas pa ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba/ ma grol ba rnams grol bar byed pa/
18a2(mdo sde): phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing / dkon mo chog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi chad par 'tshe ba/ theg pa chen po la nan tan byed cing rgyan chen pos
18a3(mdo sde): shin tu brgyan pa/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig dang 'dra bar byams pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang snga dro'i
18a4(mdo sde): dus su nyi ma thog mar shar ba na/ so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha'i shing bsung can bshams pa ni/ mi'i shing gsung can las khyad par du gyur pa shing gi
18a5(mdo sde): gsung des/ mi'i 'jig rten na rnams zhing dri mi zhim pa thams cad zhim par byed pa/ shing rta dkar po la gdugs dkar po bres te/ rta dkar po bzhis
18a6(mdo sde): drangs pa shing rta de re re'i steng yang gur dkar po phub pa/ gur gyi tha ma yang gser gyi dril bu dbyangs pa sna tshogs kyi spos dang / me tog rin po che'i rgyal ma
18a7(mdo sde): dang / ba dan gdugs dang / zhal zas mchog dam pa dang / rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs bshams te/ seng ge'i gdan gyi rkang pa bzhi yang bai dUr+ya mthon mchi
18a8(mdo sde): la byas pa/ de'i rgyab ni rin po che sna bdun gyi snam rten dang bcas la/ mdun yang gser las byas pa'i sngas re re yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi sgron ma'i sdod
18b1(mdo sde): bo la/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgron ma snum pa/ sa gzhi thams cad lha'i me tog gis 'chal du bkod par de lta bu dag lha'i bu me de dag gis bshams nas
18b2(mdo sde): yid gdung zhing mchi ma zag ste/ sdug bsngal chen po skyes kyang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ theg pa chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid
18b3(mdo sde): dang ldan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa mngon du bstan pa dang / chos rnam pa sna tshogs smra ba rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gang
18b4(mdo sde): na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du ma bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
18b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa bshams pa nangs kyi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas
18b6(mdo sde): cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo // lha'i bu mo rnams bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ cang mi sme bar phyogs gcig tu 'kho
18b7(mdo sde): do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang ga dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
18b8(mdo sde): tshe dga' bo la sogs pas bog mar drangs nas/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang snga dra'i dus nyi ma shar ba nas/ lha dang me las lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad ba shams
19a1(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong
19a2(mdo sde): du ma bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa nangs kyi tha ma 'di ba zhes
19a3(mdo sde): shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang bsams pa bzhin
19a4(mdo sde): du ma gyur pas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang ga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ngal gso bo la
19a5(mdo sde): sogs pas thog mar drangs nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu dag myur bar sangs rgyas gang na bar 'deng ngo zhes smras nas/ mchod pa'i yo byad
19a6(mdo sde): klu las lhag par bshams te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du ma bskor nas/
19a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa bshams pa nangs kyi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//
19a8(mdo sde): de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo // gnod sprin gyi rgyal po rnams bsam pa bzhin ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdung ste/ phyogs
19b1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang ga nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po pas kyi rgol ba bcom pa zhes bya bas thog mar drangs te/ gzhan
19b2(mdo sde): yang klung gang ga gsum cu'i bye ma snyed kyi dro za'i rgyal po mthu bo ches thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po shin
19b3(mdo sde): tu mtho ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba chen po zhes bya bas thog mar drangs
19b4(mdo sde): so// gzhan yang klung gang ga drug cu'i bye ma snyed kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal po kham bi lis thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga bdun cu'i bye ma snyed kyi tan pa'i
19b5(mdo sde): rgyal po dri med 'bab chu dang / ba ti de ta la sogs pas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed kyi srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya
19b6(mdo sde): bas thog mar drangs so// de dag kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i sems yongs su spangs nas/ mi la mi za ba dang / dgra dang 'khon du gyur pa la byams shing snying rje ba'i
19b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang / gzugs mi sdug pa yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ thams cad bzang zhing sdug par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang klung gang ga
19b8(mdo sde): dgu bcu'i byem snyed kyi nags tshal la dbang ba'i lha'i dri bsung la dga' ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga stong gi bye ma snyed kyi rig 'dzin gyi
20a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba rdzu 'phrul chen po zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi sadangs za ba'i rgyal
20a2(mdo sde): be shin tu mthong shes bya bas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga khri phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi lha'i bu mo 'dod chags can lam pa dang / sung ba shi dang /
20a3(mdo sde): tsam dang / byir sha ka la sogs pas bog mar drangs so// gnon yang klung gang ga khri brag stong gi bye ma snyed kyi sa la gnas pa'i yi dgas kyi rgyal po bzhog dkar zhes bya
20a4(mdo sde): bya ba sa thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi lha'i sras po rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po la phyogs bzhi'i mgon po sa thog mar
20a5(mdo sde): drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang ga 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rlung gi lhas ni phyogs bzhi nas sa las skyes pa'i me tog dus dang dus ma yin pa rnams sa la'i
20a6(mdo sde): shing drung du chal par bkang ngo // gzhan yang klung gang ga 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rlung dang char la dbang po'i lha rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs
20a7(mdo sde): pa mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la zhen pa na/ char rab tu phab ste/ dus su me shi bar bya ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las tsha bas gdungs pa rnams kyang shin tu
20a8(mdo sde): bsil bar bya'o snyam du sems so// gzhan yang klung gang ga nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi spos kyi ba glang chen po// ba glang gi rgyal po la hu dang / ba glang gi rgyal po gser mdog
20b1(mdo sde): dang / bgrang na rgyal po mang ba' dang / bla glang gi rgyal po mthon mthing mig dang / baglang gi rgyal po gsung can la sogs pas thogs rlung ste/ de dag pasas
20b2(mdo sde): cad kyang theg pa chen po la bsti stang byed pa/ theg pa chen po la mos pa sha stag ste/ de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ring po mi thogs pa mya ngan las 'das
20b3(mdo sde): bar shes pas/ so so nas pad+ma mo bzang po tshad med dpag tu med pa byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas/ gdong gis phyag 'tshal te/
20b4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu sdod do// gzhan yang klung gang ga nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge sgra zhes bya bas thog mar drangs te/ sems can thams cad la mi
20b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa sbyin nas/ so so nas me tog dang / 'bras bu thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
20b6(mdo sde): gcig tu sdod do// gzhan yang klung gang ga nyi shu'i bye snyed kyi/ bya'i rgyal po ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / rma bya dang / 'gan dar ba dang / ka lan ta ka dang / gu yog
20b7(mdo sde): dang / ne tse dang / ko shi la dang / ba hi ka dang / ka la ping ka dang / 'tsho byed la sogs pa bya'i rgyal po rnams kyang so so nas me tog dang 'bras bu thogs te/
20b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang na par lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyig bas la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu sbeng do// gzhan yang krung gang gnyi shu'i byim snying kyi chu glang dang /
21a1(mdo sde): ba glang dang / lug la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ grong khyer rtsa mchog gi 'obs dang //
21a2(mdo sde): shang shong thams cad kyang dri bsung dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ro bri bar ldan pa'i 'o mas kun tu gang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu sdod do// gzhan yang klung gang
21a3(mdo sde): nyi sha'i bye ma snyed kyi gling bzhi la/ gnas pa'i drang srong bzod pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas thog mar drangs te/ so so nas me tog dang / spos dang / 'bras
21a4(mdo sde): bu mngar ba la sogs pa thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor nas bcom
21a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod po nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//
21a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang nas/ drang srong rnams bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyi yid gdungs
21a7(mdo sde): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi bung ba'i rgyal po sgra snyan zhes bya bas thog mar drangs nas/ bung ba thams cad kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
21a8(mdo sde): thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gcig bskor nas phyogs gcig tu sdang // de'i tshe
21b1(mdo sde): 'jam bu gling na gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma thams cad 'dus te/ de la gnyis ma gtogs pa ni 'od srung chen po dang dga' bo'o// gzhan yang 'jig
21b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs med pa/ tshad med pa klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed dang / 'dzam bu gling gi ri la sogs pa'i ri rab ri'i rgyal po la sogs pa thog mar drangs te/ ri
21b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ni shin tu brgyan pa ni/ nags tshal rgyas pa ni/ shing rnams kyi lo ma dang / yal ga yang ran par nyi ma'i 'od mchod pa dang / me tog rnam
21b4(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs rgyas pa dang / kho ra khor yug tu 'bab chu dang / chu mig yongs su dag cing dri bsung dang ldan pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha
21b5(mdo sde): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rig 'dzin dang drang srong la sogs pas rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pas/ yongs
21b6(mdo sde): su gang bar gyur to// lha dang drang srong de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
21b7(mdo sde): 'khod do// gzhan yang grangs med pa'i klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho bzhi'i lha dang 'bab chu kun gyi lha gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyang
21b8(mdo sde): sngas pas lhag par cad pa'i la byad ba shems te/ lha rnams kyi lus kyi 'ang dang / ril mo'i mabyang dang / ses gyi tshwa'i 'di kyang 'i snang bar byas nas/
22a1(mdo sde): me tog tsam bkas klung ha ring ba te logs su gtor te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'ja
22a2(mdo sde): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe grong khyer rtsa mchog ge shing sA la'i tshal thams cad kyang skya bor gyur te/ steng gi nam mkha' la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal maud 'ang
22a3(mdo sde): 'bur dang ri mor ldan pa/ rgyan gyis mdzes pa kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ gzhal med khang gi drung na chu mig dang / rdzing bu dang mche'u las/ me tog
22a4(mdo sde): pad mo skyes pa ni/ byang gi sgra mi snyan nam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi skyed mos tshal shin tu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang 'dra bar gyur to// de'i tshe na shing sA la'i cha la kun tu rnam
22a5(mdo sde): ba sna tshogos brgyan cing shin tu yid du 'ong bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha dang mi dang lho ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
22a6(mdo sde): ltas yin par rig nas/ thams cad yid mya ngan gyis gdungs te mi dga' bar gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi pa'i rgyal po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dag/ gcig la
22a7(mdo sde): gcig 'di skad du kye skyes bu dag 'jig rten du lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa mchod pa bshams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa ltos/ bdag kyang de bzhin
22a8(mdo sde): du mchod par bya'o// gal te bdag cag gis nangs kyi tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur du nges so// zhes smras
22b1(mdo sde): so// de nas rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa snga ma bas shin tu lhag par bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ man da ra ba dang / me tog men da ra ba chen po dang / me
22b2(mdo sde): tog ka tsi li ka dang / ka tsi li ka chen po dang / me tog man dzu sha ka dang / me tog man dzu sha ka chen po dang / me tog san ta ni ka dang / san ta ni ka chen po dang / me tog
22b3(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du 'ong ba chen po dang / me tog kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu bzang po chen po dang / me tog dus can dang / dus can chen po dang / me tog gi
22b4(mdo sde): bsung gi grong khyer dang / gsung gi grong khyer chen po dang / me tog rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba chen po dang / me tog mdong ldan dang / mdong ldan chen po dang /
22b5(mdo sde): me tog bsung myos dang / bsung myos chen po dang / me tog kun tu bsung dang / kun tu bsung chen po dang / me tog lha'i gser 'dab dang / me tog klu zhes bya ba dang / shing
22b6(mdo sde): pa ri tsi tri'i me tog dang / shing ko tsi da ra'i me tog dang / gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zhal zas ro bro ba dang / ldan pa thogs te sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas/
22b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyi nyi zla'i 'od kyang zil gyis gnan to// mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la ma
22b8(mdo sde): ba bya bar bshams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi bsrung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo // de'i tshe lha rnams kyang bsam pa bzhin ma gyur pas/ mya ngan
23a1(mdo sde): gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gnas
23a2(mdo sde): kyi lha rnams kyis/ snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad bshams nas/ me tog thogs pa'ang snga ma dang 'dra ste/ dri bsung gis shin tu ma ngad pa
23a3(mdo sde): ni yid du 'ong ba ste/ gzhal med khang rgyal bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang / gzhal med khang chung ngu rnams bshams te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas
23a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po la
23a5(mdo sde): dad cing mos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes cig ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus
23a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo // de nas brgya byin dang lha'i 'khor rnams bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyi yid gdungs nas
23a7(mdo sde): phyogs gcig shig tu 'khod do// 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi bar du mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
23a8(mdo sde): gdugs gcig pas kyang gcig bzang ba'o// rin po che'i gdugs nings kyi chung ngu yang gling bzhi khebs so// ba dan nangs kyi chung ngu yang rgya mtsho bzhi 'khor
23b1(mdo sde): to// rgyal mtshan nangs kyi dma' ba yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas la reg te/ rlung gis bskyod na sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa dang / zhal zas bul du byung ba rnam
23b2(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
23b3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa nangs kyi tha ma 'di bzhos shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas dus
23b4(mdo sde): mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su gnang ngo // de nas lha rnams kyang rnams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyi yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
23b5(mdo sde): de la gcig ma rtogs pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo ste/ tshangs pa'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha
23b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'od kyis gling bzhi kun snang bar byas nas/ 'dod pa'i khams na lha dang mi dang / nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang bar byas so// de dag kyang so so nas rin po che'i
23b7(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang gdugs thogs pa ni/ ba ngan nangs kyi thung ba yang tshangs pa'i gnas nas shing sA la'i tshal thug pa thogs nas/ sangs rgyas gang
23b8(mdo sde): na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gabs la skyibs phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la
24a1(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag gi mchod pa nangs kyi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dus
24a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo // tshangs pa'i lha rnams bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod
24a3(mdo sde): do// de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzang rigs kyang lha ma yin gyi 'khor dpag tu med pa lhags so// de rnams kyi lus kyi 'od kyang tshangs pa'i lha bas lhag par
24a4(mdo sde): gyur te/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang gdugs rnams thogs nas/ gdugs nangs kyi chung ngu yang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs so// phul
24a5(mdo sde): du byung ba'i zhal zas mchog rnams thogs nas/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
24a6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa nangs kyi tha ma 'di bzhes cig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs
24a7(mdo sde): pas dus mkhyen pas/ cang mi gsung bar bshes su ma gnang nas/ lha ma yin rnams bsam bzhin ma gyur pas/ mya ngan gyi yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
24a8(mdo sde): do// de'i tshe 'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po bdud sdig to can yang 'khor lha'i bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa dang bcas te sems can dmyal ba'i sgo phye nas/ yongs
24b1(mdo sde): su bsil zhing dga' ba'i chu phab ste/ de dag 'di skad ces bsgo'o// khyed la sogs pas gzhan ci yang mi nus kyis/ sems rtse gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa
24b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis la mchod pa byed pa la rjes su yid rang ba gyis shig dang // khyed yun rin por bde bar 'gyur ro// de
24b3(mdo sde): nas bdud sdig to can dmyal ba'i mtshon cha dang / sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba/ me rab tu 'bar ba yang bsil ba'i char gyis rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byi/
24b4(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyis/ bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang 'di snyam du sems bskyed par gyur to// thams cad kyis ral gri dang mda' gzhu dang / go cha dang mtshon shag tu
24b5(mdo sde): dang / lcags kyu dang / lcags tho dang / dgra sta dang 'khor lo dang / zhags pa la sogs te mtshon cha thams cad spangs nas/ mchod pa'i yo byad lha dang mi
24b6(mdo sde): las khyad par du gyur pa bshams so// gdugs nangs kyi chung ngu yang stong 'bring po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyebs pa thogs nas/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags
24b7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang theg pa chen po la
24b8(mdo sde): rab tu dad cing mos te/ theg pa chen po bsrung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig khe dang grags pa'i phyir ram/ gzhan skrag
25a1(mdo sde): par byed pa'i phyir ram/ gzhan la rdzun bya ba'i phyir ram/ gzhan gyi yid dang sbyor ba tsam gyis phyir theg pa chen po 'di 'dzin par
25a2(mdo sde): byed na/ bden yang rung brdzun yang rung / bdag cag gi de'i tshe/ gang zag de'i 'jigs pa bsal ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags 'di 'bul lo// cog kye ta ta la/
25a3(mdo sde): tseg kye lo ha le/ ma hA lo ha le/ a tsa la ta la swA hA/ sngags 'dis ni sems stor ba rnams dang / 'jigs skrag pa dang / chos smra ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos kyi
25a4(mdo sde): bar du gcod pa dang / mu stegs can 'dul ba dang / bdag gi lus bsrung ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / theg pa chen po bsrung ba'i slad du/ gsang
25a5(mdo sde): sngags 'di 'bul lo// gang gis sngags 'di yid la bgyid na/ ba glang rmig pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bral bar 'gyur/ gal te 'brog dgon pa'am/ yul sa stongs
25a6(mdo sde): pa bag tsha ba'i gnas su mchis na yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ chu dang me dang seng ge dang / stag dang spyang ku dang dgras 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa
25a7(mdo sde): las yang thar bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gis gsang sngags 'di yid la bgyid na/ 'jigs pa de dag la sogs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
25a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags 'di 'dzin pa la bdag cag gis skyab cing sba ba ni ji ltar rus sbal yan lag drug sbeng ba bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni g.yo dang
25b1(mdo sde): sgyus 'di skad du smra ba ma lags kyis gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa la bdag cag gis mthu stobs btang ngo // bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa'i tha ma
25b2(mdo sde): 'di bzhes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyi mchod pa zhal zas 'bul ba rnams ni mi bzhes so//
25b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'khor rnams bzhi la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di bzhes so zhes bka' stsal nas/ cang mi gsung bar gzhan ni bzhes su ma
25b4(mdo sde): gnang ngo // de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang nas/ bdud sdig to can bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur pas/ mya ngan gyi yid gdungs te phyogs
25b5(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe lha dbang sgrar chen po yang / 'khor lha grangs med dpag tu med pa dang bcas te/ mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa yang / tshangs
25b6(mdo sde): pa dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten mgon po bzhi dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang sde brgyad dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams
25b7(mdo sde): zil gyis gnon pa ni/ ji ltar sol ba'i drung na shel bzhag pa dang 'dra ste/ thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs nangs kyi chung ngu yang stong gsum
25b8(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su khebs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
26a1(mdo sde): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// lan grangs med par bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
26a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi mchod pa'i yo byad nangs kyi tha ma 'di 'bul ba ni ji ltar bdag cag la sbrang bus mchod pa 'bul ba'am/ chu snyim pa gang rgya mtsho chen
26a3(mdo sde): por blugs pa'am/ me mar chung ngu ma zhig gi 'od kyis nyi ma brgya stong la btang ba'am/ dbyar me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dus su me tog gcig thogs te me tog mang po'i
26a4(mdo sde): khrod du bzhag pa'am/ yung kar 'brum bu cig tsam ri rab ri'i rgyal po la btang na rgya mtsho dang nyi ma dang / me tog mang po dang / ri rab la mi sman pa 'dra bar/ bcom
26a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gi mchod pa yang de dang 'dra'o// gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang me tog dang rol mo dang / ba dan dang / gdugs
26a6(mdo sde): dang rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bkang ste/ mchod kyang smos pa'i rin du mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i slad du sems
26a7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang byol song gi skye gnas su sdug bsngal mang po len no// de bas na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/
26a8(mdo sde): mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol lo// de'i tshe 'di nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol/
26b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa zhes bya ba na/ sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
26b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten rig pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
26b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas des/ nye gnas chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod song la/ 'di
26b4(mdo sde): nas nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
26b5(mdo sde): ba/ mkhyen pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sbyar ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
26b6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/ ring por mi thogs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar nye'o// rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i zhal zas bsung can
26b7(mdo sde): dri shin tu zhim pa dang / yid du 'ong zhing bde bar 'gyur ba/ 'di thogs te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phul cig/ bcom ldan 'das de gsol nas yongs
26b8(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs so// rigs kyi bu khyod la phyag 'tshal zhing ba chem du gyur ba yang zhu ba'i dus la bab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
27a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po lus dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
27a2(mdo sde): te/ lan gsum bskor nas/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
27a3(mdo sde): gyi khams gang na bar dong ngo // de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas 'khor gyi nang na tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang /
27a4(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi'i mgon po dang bdud sdig to can dang / dbang bsgyur ba chen po la sogs pa de dag gis sa g.yos pa mthong nas/ lus skyi bung zhes byed de/ lce
27a5(mdo sde): yang skam pa tsam du dngang skrag par gyur te/ so sor 'gro b.re chas nas/ lus kyi 'od dang gzi brjid kyang mi gnang bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
27a6(mdo sde): nur pa 'dug pa las langs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed 'jigs par ma byed cig/ khyed ma 'jigs
27a7(mdo sde): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di nas shar phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams klung gang ga'i bye ma grangs med dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi
27a8(mdo sde): khams yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan zhes bya ba na/ sangs rgyas na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan
27b1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gzhis dang ldan pa bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'khor byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dang bcas te/ 'jin
27b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la/ mchod du 'ongs pas byang chub sems dpa' de'i gzi brjid dang byin gyis/ khyed kyi lus 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to//
27b3(mdo sde): de bas na khyed ma 'jigs par shin tu dga' ba skyed cig/ de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyis rgyang ma nas sangs rgyas de dang / 'khor mang po
27b4(mdo sde): rnams mthong ba ni ji ltar me long gsal ba'i nong na/ bdag gis gzugs brnyan mthong ba bzhin no// de nas yang 'jam dpal gyis 'khor mang po rnams la
27b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// khyed kyi sangs rgyas de mthong ba ni/ ji ltar sangs rgyas 'di mthong ba dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhan yang sangs
27b6(mdo sde): rgyas phyogs dgu na bzhugs pa dpag tu med pa snyed kyang mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kyi hud kyi hud 'jig
27b7(mdo sde): rten stongs so// 'jig rten stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras so// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
27b8(mdo sde): mang po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ba ni/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' de'i ba sku'i khung bu re re nas me
28a1(mdo sde): tog pad mo chen be re re byung la pad mo re re'i steng yang grong khyer bdun khri brgya stong ste yod do// grong khyer de yang chu zheng gab par
28a2(mdo sde): grong khyer yangs pa can dang mnyam ste/ ra ba dang 'obs kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis smras pa/ rin po che'i shing ta la rim pa bdun dang ra ba/ de na gnas pa'i mi thams
28a3(mdo sde): cad kyang rab tu bde zhing skyid pa/ grong khyer de'i cog par yang / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa/ cog pa de re re'i bar na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing
28a4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/ me tog dang 'bras bu shin tu rgyas pa/ rlung mi drag pas skyod pa na sgra skad shin tu snyan pa ni/ ji ltar lha'i rol mo zer ba lta bu de na gnas
28a5(mdo sde): pa'i mi dag gis thos na/ phul du byung ba'i rab tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// 'obs kyi nang yang yongs su dag pa'i chu bsung can bai dur+ya dang / 'dra bas yongs
28a6(mdo sde): gang ngo // chu de dag la rin po che sna bdun gyi gru yod do// gru de'i steng na mi dag brtse zhing khrus byed de/ gcig la gcig rab tu dga' zhing bde ba myong ngo // gzhan
28a7(mdo sde): yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi pade mo skye ba na/ ud pa la dang / kumu ta dang / pad ma dang / pun ta ri ka la sogs pa shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam skye'o//
28a8(mdo sde): 'obs kyi g.yas g.yon na skyed pos tshal mang du yod de/ skyed mo che la de re re'i steng na yang chu mig dang bcas pa'i rdzing bu lnga lnga yod do// rdzing bu de dag gi
28b1(mdo sde): nang na yang me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka che khyad kyang shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam skyes te/ dri bsung shin tu mngad pa/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba/
28b2(mdo sde): chu shin tu gsal zhing 'jam pa/ ngang pa dang ngur pa la sogs pa rkyal zhing rtse ba skyed mos tshal de na/ gzhan yang rin po che'i gzhal med khang yod de gzhal med
28b3(mdo sde): khang de re re yang chu zheng gab pa dpag tshad bzhi yod do// gzhal med khang de'i ra ba yang rin po che sna bzhi las byas so// 'di lta ste gser dang / dngul dang /
28b4(mdo sde): bai dUr+ya dang shel las byas te/ bad khams kyang gser las byas/ sa gzhi ni mu sa la gar pa las slang ste/ gser gyi bye ma gdal pa/ gzhal med khang de'i
28b5(mdo sde): drung na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'bab chu dang / chu mig dang / rdzing bu yod de/ rdzing bu de re re la yang gser gyi them skas bco brgyad do// chu shing yang 'dzam bu
28b6(mdo sde): chu klung gi gser la byis te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi skyed mos tshal rab tu bde ba can dang 'dra'o// grong khyer de re re'i nang na yang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong
28b7(mdo sde): snyed do// rgyal po de re re yang btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas grangs med yod do// de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' bo// de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyang
28b8(mdo sde): se se'i gnas na rtse zhing dga' bo// de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni rna bar gzhan me grag gi bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i sgra 'ba' shig grag go// me tog de
29a1(mdo sde): / re re'i nang na yang seng ge'i khri re re yod do// khri de'i rkang pa bzhi yang bai DUr+ya mthon mthing las byas pa/ khams gsum las
29a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i na bza' shin tu 'jam pa dkar pos bting ngo // khri de re re'i steng na rgyal po re re 'dug ste/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis sems can rnams 'dul te/ de la rang sems
29a3(mdo sde): can la la ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde glegs bam du bri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / ji ltar smras pa bzhin du nan tan du byed pa
29a4(mdo sde): dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i rab tu byed do// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa/ des bdag gi lus la sems can tshad med pa bkod pa de yang / 'jig
29a5(mdo sde): rten gyi bde ba btang nas/ thams cad 'di skad du kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po ma lon pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// zhes
29a6(mdo sde): sbas so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshad med pa snyed kyis bskor te/ de lta bu'i rdza 'phral mngon par bstan nas/ mtsho/
29a7(mdo sde): pa'i yo byad tshad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / zhal zas bsung can thogs te/ gang zhig la zhal zas de'i bsung gi reg na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad
29a8(mdo sde): zhi bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag mthong bar gyur to// byang chub sems
29b1(mdo sde): dpa' lus dpag tu med pa ni/ lus chen po dpag tu med de/ na mkha' dang mnyam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par gzhan gang yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i
29b2(mdo sde): lus kyi mtha' shes par nus pa med do// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa/ 'khor dang bcas pas mchod bcas pas mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas
29b3(mdo sde): lhag pa bshams te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar ba sti stang dang bcas nas/ bcom
29b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gsheg
29b5(mdo sde): pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du
29b6(mdo sde): lho dang nab dang / byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa grangs med pa snyed kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas lhag pa
29b7(mdo sde): bshams nas/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags pa'i phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du rgyas par rig par bya'o// de'i tshe shing sA la drung gnyis kyi bar bsod nams kyi sa gzhi
29b8(mdo sde): bkra shis kyi gnas der/ khor khor yug tu dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar 'khor gyis sa stong cung zad kyang med par yongs su gang ngo // de'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas 'dus
30a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas te 'dug pa'i gnas ni snang gi rtse mo 'am/ khab kyi rtse mo 'am/ rdul phra mo tsam mo//
30a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'dus par gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa 'khor thams
30a3(mdo sde): cad kyang 'dus par gyur te/ de la gnyis ma gtogs ni 'od srung chen po dang / dga' bo rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sbrul gdugs pa ltas pa tsam
30a4(mdo sde): gyi 'chi bar byed pa dang / sbur ba dang / za gdug dang / sdig pa'i bar du sdig pa can gyi las spyod pa rnam pa bcu drug po ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad 'dus par gyur
30a5(mdo sde): to// srin po ngan pa dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis sdig pa'i bsam pa btang nas/ gcig la gcig byams shing sdug pa'i sems bskyed pa ni/ pha'am/
30a6(mdo sde): ma'am/ pho nu lta bur gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems bskyed
30a7(mdo sde): de/ gcig ma gtogs pa ni log sred can no// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sa gzhi thams
30a8(mdo sde): cad 'jam par gyur te/ ngam grog dang bye ma dang / gseg ma dang / rdo ba dang / shing tsher ma can dang / rtsa gdug pa yang med par gyur te/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
30b1(mdo sde): kyis shin tu brgyan pa ni/ nung phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang
30b2(mdo sde): bo thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed shin tu snang ba ni ji ltar me long gsal ba'i nang na bdag gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin no// de nas
30b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od rnam pa lnga byung ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po snang bar byas nas/ de dag gi lus kyi 'od zer mi mngon par zil gyis
30b4(mdo sde): mnan te/ bya ba byas nas phyir zhal gyi sgor zhugs so// de'i tshe na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa 'khor rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer phyir yang / zhal
30b5(mdo sde): gyi sgor zhugs pa mthong nas/ thams cad 'jigs skrag ste/ lus kyi ba spu kun kyang langs nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'od zer
30b6(mdo sde): bkye nas/ slar zhugs pa 'di ni rgyu med pa 'am rkyen med pa ma yin te/ phyogs bcur mdzad pa kun mdzad nas/ tha ma yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas yin du
30b7(mdo sde): nges so// kyi hud kyi hud de bzhin gshegs pas tshad med pa bzhi thugs btang nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa yang bzhes su gnang ngo // deng slan chad ni
30b8(mdo sde): ye shes kyi nyi ma yang nub par gyur/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi gru yang bying bar gyur to// kyi bung re sdug / 'jig rten sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs par gyur te zhes smras
31a1(mdo sde): @so// brang la khu tshur gyis brdeg cing tshong nge 'don pas/ lus kyi mi bzod pa tsam du shin tu 'dar te ba spu'i khung bu kun nas khrag kyang
31a2(mdo sde): zag par gyur to// / 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/
31a3(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa'o// / de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na grong khyer rtsa mchog gi shing mkhan gyi bu dge bsnyen btsun da zhes bya ba'i rigs 'thun pa'i 'kho
31a4(mdo sde): lnga bcu dang / lhan gcig tu 'dus so// de 'jig rten du bcas pa dag dge ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sngon gyi tshul btang nas/ 'dug pa las langs te/ bla gos
31a5(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu byas/ pus so g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na logs su thal mo sbyar nas mchi ma blags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos
31a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas/ bdag cag gi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes su gsol/
31a7(mdo sde): de yang sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bsgral ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni deng slan chad mgon ma mchis/ skyabs ma mchis dpung gnyen ma mchis/
31a8(mdo sde): rten ma mchis/ gnas ma mchis te/ shin tu dbul 'phongs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa las slad ma mchis pa'i dus kyi chod tsam zhig gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das
31b1(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes nas/ gdod yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dper na rgyal rigs sam/
31b2(mdo sde): bram ze 'am gdol pa yang rung / dbul 'bongs pas yul gzhan du mchis te/ zhing gi las la zhugs nas rmon pa dul ba dang / zhing yang dul la sa gzhi mnyam pa dang /
31b3(mdo sde): gseg ma dang zhing gi ngo yur ma mchis na/ dgun char 'ba' zhig la rera'o// bcom ldan 'das rmon pa dul ba zhes bzhes bgyi ba ni/ lus dang ngag gi las bdun po'i dben//
31b4(mdo sde): zhing shi na la sa gzhi mnyam zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab kyi dpe'o// gseg ma dang zhing gi ngo yur ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ nyon mongs pa'i dpe'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag
31b5(mdo sde): la smon pa dul ba dang / zhing gshin pa yang mchis la/ zhing gi ngo yur ma bstsal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi char 'ba' zhig la re'o// rigs
31b6(mdo sde): dbul po bzhi ni bdag lags te/ bdag ni bla na med pa'i chos rin po ches dbul te 'phongs na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi dbul bongs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal
31b7(mdo sde): zhing / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems can chad ma mchis pa bsgral du gsol/ bdag cag gi mchod pa 'di shin tu chung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
31b8(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor meng po kun gyi bsod snyoms su 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la mgon ma mchis skyabs ma mchis/ dpung gnyen ma mchis na/ sgra gcan 'dzin
32a1(mdo sde): @/ bur thugs brtse bar dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa 'dul zhing kha le sgyur bas
32a2(mdo sde): tsun da la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so// ngas khyod kyi dbul phongs pa med pa dang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi char khyod kyi lus la dbab cing / chos kyi mya
32a3(mdo sde): gu skye bar bya'o// khyod ni da ltar tshe dang mdog dang / stobs dang bde ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i so sor yang dag par rig pa thob par 'dod de ngas khyod la tshe dang mdog dang / stobs
32a4(mdo sde): dang bde ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par shes pa rtag tu sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tsun da zas kyi sbyin pa byin pas/ khyad par med pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa
32a5(mdo sde): gnyis thob par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa dang / bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'o// ngas
32a6(mdo sde): kyang khyod kyi mchod pa nangs kyi tha ma bzhes pas/ khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// de nas tsun das bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
32a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar/ srin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis khyad par ma mchis so zhes pa de ljags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngar sbyin
32a8(mdo sde): ba bzhes pa ni/ nyon mongs pa yangs pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang rdzogs par ma gyur/ sems can gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bgyid pa'ang
32b1(mdo sde): ma lags so// sbyin pa byin pa slad kyis bzhes pa ni/ nyon mongs pa yang bas par gyur la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs shing / sems can gyi
32b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags so// sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni sems can no// sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni lha'i lha'o// sbyin pa sngar
32b3(mdo sde): blangs pa ni zas dang 'dres pa'i lus/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i lus/ tha ma can gyi lus mi rtag pa'i lus so// sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis
32b4(mdo sde): pa'i sku/ rdo rje lta bu'i chos kyi sku/ rtag pa'i sku/ mtha' yas pa'i sku lags na/ ji'i slad du sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis shes gsung / sngar
32b5(mdo sde): sbyin po blangs pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rdzogs par mi 'gyur te/ sha'i mig 'ba' shig
32b6(mdo sde): thob kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan mi thob pa nas/ shes rab kyi spyan gyi bar du thob pa ma lags so// sbyin pa byis bzhes pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa
32b7(mdo sde): nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs la/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan pa nas/ shes rab kyi spyan gyi bar du ldan pa lags na/ ji'i slad du sgri
32b8(mdo sde): pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par mchis shes gsung / bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni blangs ma thag tu mtshol nas/ de ma thag tu zhu bas che dang mdog dang
33a1(mdo sde): stobs dang bde ba dngas so yang dag par shes pa thob pa lags so// sbyin pa byis pazhes pa'i gsol ba dang / nub ma mchis
33a2(mdo sde): la/ 'bras bu rnam pa lnga po yang ma mchis na/ ji'i slad du sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis shes gsung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
33a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal pa tshad med mtha' yas grangs med pa'i bar du zas sam/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sku ma yin/ nang gi tha ma'i sku ma
33a4(mdo sde): yin te/ rtag pa'i sku chos kyi sku rdo rje'i ska'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma mthong ba ni/ nyon mongs pa'i lus zas dang bcas pa'i lus/ nang gi tha ma'i
33a5(mdo sde): lus so// byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe/ bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bsod snyoms nu ma thag tu sangs
33a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ de bas na sbyin pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par med do zhes
33a7(mdo sde): ngas gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' thog ma yang bdud bzhi bcom la/ da mya ngan las 'da' kar yang bdud rnam pa ni bcom pas/ de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa
33a8(mdo sde): gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par med do zhes ngas gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe na mdo sde bcu gnyis rgyas par ma gsung mod kyi/ thams cad sngar thugs su
33b1(mdo sde): chung la/ dmya ngan las 'da' kar sems can rnams la rgyas par bye zhing snyan pas/ de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis la khyad par med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
33b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar bsod snyoms mi gsol mod kyi/ nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs te/ sngon de bzhin gshegs
33b3(mdo sde): bas/ mnag rdzi mo nan ta dang / nan ta pa la gnyis kyis/ 'o ma'i 'jam phul ba bzhes nas/ gdong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
33b4(mdo sde): rgyas so// nga ni yang dag par bshos mi gsol te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'di dag gi phyir/ khyod kyis mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes mod kyi/ yang dag par
33b5(mdo sde): na gsol ba med do// de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tsun da'i mchod pa bzhes pa mthong nas/ thams cad dga' mgu rangs te/ skad
33b6(mdo sde): mthun pas tsun da la legs so// shin tu legs so zhes smra te khyod kyis ming btags pa thog tu bab po// tsun da zhes bya ba ni don dam pa la mkhas pa ste/ khyod
33b7(mdo sde): kyis kyang deng 'dir don chen po brtsam pas/ de bas na don las ming tsun da zhes btags te/ khyod kyis ni tshe 'di nyid la grags pa dang / phan pa'i don chen po thob
33b8(mdo sde): cing smon pa yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ ngo mtshar che'o// tsun da ma'i nang du skyes kyang bla na med pa'i bde ba rnyed dka' bathong bo// legs so tsun dme tog
34a1(mdo sde): u dum par ltar 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa ste/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa yang shin tu dka' la/ sangs rgyas da
34a2(mdo sde): phrang nas dad pa skye ba yang shin tu dka'/ chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'/ sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' kar mchod pa bshams te/ bral ba yang shin tu dka'
34a3(mdo sde): go/ tsun da la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs te/ ston gyi tshes bco lnga'i zla ba ltar rgyas zhing yongs su dag la/ sprin nam na 'un gyis
34a4(mdo sde): mchod na thams cad kyis lta ba dang 'dra bar/ khyod de dang 'dra bar bdag cag la sogs pas shin tu blta bar gyur to// khyod kyi mchod pa nangs kyi tha ma bzhes pas khyod kyi
34a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ tsun da la phyag 'tshal lo// de bas na khyod ni zla ba yongs su rgyas pa dang 'dra ste/ sems can thams cad gang
34a6(mdo sde): yang mi lta ba med do// tsun da khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi'i lus thob kyang sems ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang 'dra bas/ tsun da khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa
34a7(mdo sde): ste/ sgra gcan 'dzin dang tha mi dad do// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi'i nang du khyod skyes pa/ drug po lha las shin tu 'phags/
34a8(mdo sde): bdag cag 'khor rnams thams cad kyis/ khyod la phyag 'tshal gsol ba 'debs/ mi'i skyes bu khyu mchog ni// yongs su mya ngan 'da' zhes gsung // bdag cag
34b1(mdo sde): rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// sangs rgyas bzhugs par gsol ba thob// yun du 'jig rten 'dir bzhugs shing // tshad med 'khor la phyin pa'i phyir// mkhas pa
34b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// bla med chos mchog bshad du gsol// khyod kyis gsol ba ma btab na// bdag cag rnams ni mi 'tshe'o// de bas khyod kyis gsol ba thob/
